characters.story: Picture elder sister taking form - it whispers "Dzir" with vivid energy!
Like a body, this character means lie down and whispers "Tahng"!
Like a body, this character means dodge and whispers "Dwoh"!
See how the body forms stoop? It sings "Gohng!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The mouth takes the shape of hanker, shouting "Shir!" sharply!
The hand stands for flog, whispering "Kao" softly reached by outstretched fingers!
See how the sun forms summer heat? It whispers "Shoo" softly!
The strokes unite to show behold, whispering "Doo" softly - a vivid image to remember!

"Pah!" Eight runners sang cheerfully - prostrate oneself, head down, fatso don't move!
"Tah!" Wooden leg stomped water sharply - trample and step, stamp!
"Tee, is that an animal foot?" Wooden leg questioned the sovereign curiously - hoof, horse hooves!
When the leg meets the hand, they form catch, singing "Jwoh!" cheerfully!
The leg takes the shape of step on, whispering "Tsigh" softly!
"Bung!" Wooden leg scaled the mountain sharply - hop, jump and bounce!
"Dyeh!" Wooden leg stumbled cheerfully - slump, fall and tumble face up!
"Tsoo!" Person with wooden leg commanded sharply - urge, hasten and rush!
"Tee!" Wooden leg found it easy cheerfully - kick, boot and strike!
"Dzao!" Body of wood pulp commanded sharply - impetuous, irritable and jittery!
"Dzao!" Mouth like wood pulp commanded sharply - chirping, noisy twitter and static!
When the wood meets the water, they form bath, whispering "Dzao" softly!
See how the water forms algae? It whispers "Dzao" softly like ripples spreading across a pond!
"Tsao!" Hand worked wood pulp cheerfully - exercise, drill and practice!
"Dzao!" Fire burned wood pulp sharply - parched, dry and arid!
"Yueh!" Wooden leg with wings commanded sharply - leap, jump and bound!

A striking symbol for cunning that asks "Hwah? Crafty?" curiously!
